results.title: Simvastatin does not diminish the in vivo degeneration of decellularized aortic conduits.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001022 @@@aortic valve insufficiency@@@ (day 14) were fed either with a pro-calcific diet (group C; n = 17), or the same diet additionally supplemented with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (group S; n = 16).

citations.NLM: Assmann A, Horstkötter K, Munakata H, Schiffer F, Delfs C, Zwirnmann K, Barth M, Akhyari P, Lichtenberg A. Simvastatin does not diminish the in vivo degeneration of decellularized aortic conduits. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 2014 Oct;64(4):332-42. PMID: 24887683
